attributes.action: change the anti discrimination act to include alternative appearance in the work place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like the anti discrimination act to include the way people look. for example, piercings, tattoos, hair color and style, dress, ect. we find it unfair that a person should be judged because of the way they look when applying for work. it is unfair to assume that because a person doesnot conform to what the general public choose, they should be cast aside, even though they have the ability to perform the same, if not beter than their counterparts
